abstract: Exxon Mobil and Royal Dutch Shell reported lackluster third-quarter earnings because of declining oil and natural gas production and weak domestic gas prices, but refinery operations were strong.
snippet: Exxon Mobil and Royal Dutch Shell reported lackluster third-quarter earnings because of declining oil and natural gas production and weak domestic gas prices, but refinery operations were strong.
lead_paragraph: HOUSTON — Exxon Mobil and Royal Dutch Shell reported lackluster earnings on Thursday because of declining oil and natural gas production and weak domestic gas prices.

headline.main: Exxon and Shell Earnings, Hurt by Natural Gas, Are Helped by Refining
headline.print_headline: Exxon and Shell Earnings, Hurt by Natural Gas, Are Helped by Refining
